ca.mcgill.ecse321.newftms

Class InventoryMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        • android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
          • ca.mcgill.ecse321.newftms.InventoryMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompatApi23.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback

    public class InventoryMenu
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    This activity gets created when the user clicks on the button Inventory Menu in the MainActivity page. You can view and modify the quantities of all inventory items you have and you can order a meal.

      protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, Intent data)
      Gets called whenever user presses the back button when in the Customize Menu to come back to this activity.
      protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Creates the equipment, dishes and supplies spinners.
      void placeOrder(View v)
      Orders the selected meal and calls the dishes (for popularity value) and supplies spinners to be updated with the new values in the order manager.
      void updateDishInfo()
      Updates the text below the dishes spinner, indicating the quantity of the selected meal that is remaining, the price and the supplies the selected meal is made of.

      • placeOrder

        public void placeOrder(View v)
        Orders the selected meal and calls the dishes (for popularity value) and supplies spinners to be updated with the new values in the order manager.
        Parameters:
        v - View that calls this method, so the Order button.

      • onActivityResult

        protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                int resultCode,
                                Intent data)
        Gets called whenever user presses the back button when in the Customize Menu to come back to this activity. This method ensures this activity gets updates with the new values in the order manager.
        Overrides:
        onActivityResult in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        requestCode - Integer sent to CustomizeMenu activity from this activity by the customizeOrder method.
        resultCode -
        data -
